Date First Available December 8, 2021

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $189.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 13:45:00 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Mimoglad Best Office Chair

Not To Brag, But After Extensive Research

Mimoglad—One of the largest professional manufacturers and exporters of Office Chair. Founded in 1995, has 5 major brands, 28 patents, passed various international tests and certifications including UL, GS, ETL, CQC….

We continually innovate our products which are exported to more than 60 countries. Our goal is to offer the most comfortable & most cost-effective chair and the best service in the world.

What makes our products unique?

Mimoglad has done a lot of investigations before we launched the ergonomic chairs. A bad office chair can cause back strain, leg problems, and carpal tunnel deformities, all of which will waste work time and reduce work efficiency. In a difficult situation, the loss of work efficiency means your unemployment rate is also rising. This is scary, isn’t it?

What do we provide?

We offer 5 years free fix to assure all customers that any needed repairs and replacements will be covered. Including but not limited to missing parts, damaged package, or Failed function.

[The Best Deal You Will Find] Every purchase is an important investment for you, including the feeling of the body, the life of the product, and the money out of pocket. Mimoglad provides 1* VALUE-FOR-MONEY ERGONOMIC CHAIR, 1*90 DAYS FREE RETURN AND REPLACEMENT, 1*5 YEARS ASSISTANT SERVICE. All problems that are faced can be solved.
[Encourage “S-Shaped” Spinal Posture] An ergonomic chair with proper support always maintain a healthy spine posture and will not have a damaging and flattening effect on your back. Good lumbar support will minimize strain or pain on the lumbar discs in your spine. The adjustable headrest prevents you from hunching forward, scrunching your shoulders. Don’t be slouching, this is the culprit.
[No Degradation of The Comfort Of The Butt] Choose sufficient padding and breathable material. Low-Quality foam can break down quickly (Not because you are a big man). So Mimoglad increased the quality & density of the foam to balance softness, durability, and support, thereby reducing pressure on your hips and tailbone. mesh fabric has a noticeable ability to wick moisture and it is highly breathable, You will not get bogged down with sweat.
[Get The Best Possible Fit and Feel] If you will be spending a lot of time in it, an adjustable computer chair is your best bet. Mimoglad chair allows lifting the headrest to land perfectly where your head is. Look for a pneumatic adjustment lever to let you bring the seat higher up or lower. the adjustable lumbar support to provide lumbar protection and eliminating lower back body strains. Reclining&rocking can help relieve pressure on your spinal discs.
[Sustainable Above First Impressions] The chair passed a commercial test so you can not worry about work and about the reliability of all elements. The frame of the high back office chair is made of strong nylon, which is most suitable for chair production. With the entire base made from high-strength metal, the strength and durability of this chair support will easily hold up to 400 lbs and for many years of extended use.

Ergonomic Backrest

Back support — maintaining a neutral posture lets your joints align naturally to reduce strain and stress on your muscles, tendons, and overall skeletal system.

Adjustable Lumbar support

Lumbar support — Good lower back or lumbar support is essential to minimize strain or compression on the lumbar discs in your spine.

360° Swivel Chair

With a modern compact looking and useful features, the ergonomic office chair goes well in office, gaming, and home.

Read more

Tension Controller

Rock for a rest — The tension device is a knob which can be adjusted to increase or decrease the force needed to rock.

Chair for 300 lbs Heavy People

4″ Seat Height liftable — Adjust the height of your office to your own height to reduce leg pressure.

Load up to 300lbs — SGS BIFMA Passed, stable for heavy people

Smoothly & quietly Wheels

Solid five-star base — made of polished aluminum alloy material, strong, non-rust than plastic.

Good for all type floor — Designed for your floor, carpet, hard surface or a combination.

Read more

4.5
Price: $189.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 13:45:00 UTC – Details)

Price: $10.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 11:33:58 UTC – Details)


Get the fast-paced Reinhard Staupe’s BLINK card game in an exclusive tin. Blink is a fast-moving one-on-one card game that involves counting, shapes and colors. This tin makes a great addition to any game cupboard and helps to keep all your cards neat and organized! ready Ages 7 years and up. Colors and decorations may vary.
This exclusive tin comes with Reinhard Staupe’s fast-moving BLINK Card Game.
BLINK Card Game is a perfect choice for kid, teen or adult game night. Blink is a challenging game for 2 opponents with intense one-on-one play.
The Blink game features lightning-fast action by two players racing head-to-head to be the first to play all of their cards by matching the shape, count or color on the cards.
This sturdy tin makes card storage easy and makes a great gift for 7 year olds and up. Includes one card deck and instructions in a collectable storage tin.

Read more

Read more

Deal Out Fun on Game Night!

For 70 years, Mattel Games has been bringing family and friends together to play. Whatever your preference — matching, counting, speed or strategy — fun is always at hand with a Mattel Card Game.

Read more

(as of Nov 30,2022 11:33:58 UTC – Details)

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

if (thankYouDiv) {
thankYouDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (errorDiv) {
errorDiv.innerHTML = ”;

onlineUrl.value = ”;
onlinePriceRaw.value = ”;

offlineStoreName.value = ”;
offlineCity.value = ”;
offlineState.value = ”;
offlinePriceRaw.value = ”;

stateDefaultOption.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();
stateDefaultPrompt.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();

setInitialStates(
onlineMonth,
currentMonth,
offlineMonth,
onlineDay,
currentDate,
offlineDay,
onlineYear,
currentYear,
offlineYear,
onlineStoreInputForm,

);

Price: $6.49
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:24:52 UTC – Details)


The UNO matching card game everyone loves goes to a galaxy far, far away with this special Star Wars edition. Featuring both classic and newer characters spanning the movies of the beloved Skywalker Saga, it also includes “The Force” wild card unique to this deck. Players aim to get rid of all their cards by matching a card in their hand with the current card shown on top of the discard pile. When players are down to one card, they must prove that the Force is with them by shouting “UNO!” This edition of the family-favorite card game makes a great gift for players 7 years and older, especially Star Wars fans. Colors and decorations may vary.
It’s the classic UNO card game everyone loves, now pitting the forces of the Light Side and the Dark Side against each other! Perfect for Younglings and Master Jedi alike, ages 7 years and older.
Each card is decorated with an iconic image from the Star Wars franchise, including classic characters from the original trilogy, the prequels and the sequels -a great collector’s edition!
Just like in the classic UNO game, players match cards by color or number in a race to empty their hand.
Includes an exclusive wild “The Force” card. Play it, choosing another player and a color. If that player has at least one card of that color, they are forced to draw 2 cards. If they don’t, play just continues with the chosen color.
UNO Star Wars makes a great gift for Star Wars fans of all ages.

5
Price: $6.49
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:24:52 UTC – Details)

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $35.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:41:55 UTC – Details)

From the brand

WOOD CITY Shut the Box Game

Shut the Box Game for Party, Family

About us

WOOD CITY aims to provide high-quality wooden early learning intelligence toys for all young children, by researching early childhood development, growth, practice.

We strive to achieve a collective vision of providing the best and up-to-date educational wooden toys for all young children, and commit to ensuring that they thrive and learn in a community where they reach their full potential and develop their intellect and imagination.

Shut the Box for 6 Players

Shut the Box for 4 Players

Fast Sling Puck Game

Upgraded Version for 6 Players: This shut the box game set designed for up to 6 players includes hexagonal game board lined with felt and completed with 1-10 numbers, instructions, 16 dice (12 colored, 4 original wood color). Kids and adults can enjoy the deal of strategy and luck and hours of fun while playing.
Learning While Playing: Simple math are required to play the shut-the-box dice game. Kids could improve basic mathematical addition skills, exercise logical thinking, problem solving abilities and enhance interpersonal communication and build good relationships with their friends. With gift box package design, this shut the box game set is a perfect gift for kids.
Blast Quick Game: No more time for a complicated game? Choose our wooden shut the box game. You can play a game for as long or as short a time as is available with 6 People. You can also customized rules to play more round.
Portable Traditional Game for Different Occasions: This 6-way close the box dice game is a portable and easy to carry wooden board game. It can be play in many different occasions, perfect for family, classroom, parties, pub etc. to have a great time with your family members, friends, classmates.
Premium Craftsmanship: The wooden shut the box game is made of solid natural wood which is durable and sturdy. Felt surface pad could reduce the noise when dice hit the board so that you can focus on the game. If you have any issues with our shut the box game, do not hesitate to get in touch with us and we will be more than happy to ensure you have a satisfying buying experience.

SHUT THE BOX GAME WOODEN for 6 PLAYERS

  • Shut the Box is a particular dice game, our upgraded version can be played up to 6 players.
  • The history of the game could be over 250 years and originated in Normandy.
  • In pubs, Shut the Box is traditionally played as a gambling game, but we don’t advocate it generally.
  • Nowadays, it becomes a more and more popular board game during family activities, parties, and festivals.
  • Either for social and family entertainment or as an excellent tool for kids to learn math calculations.
  • The player rolls the dice, adds up the numbers, and then puts down the pieces that have the sum.
  • Enjoy the luck of the game as well as exercising the ability of divergent thinking to find more combinations.

PERFECT TABLETOP GAME

  • Whether it’s a game at a party to liven things up, or a bar gambling to punish the loser for drinking.
  • It can be both considered as our first choice of tool.
  • Portable, and can play with several friends at the same time to increase the play ability.
  • Not only are there various play rules, but also can through personal luck to create thrilling moments.




Shut the Box Wooden Game for 4 Players
Car Ramp Toy for Toddler
Toddler Fine Motor Skills Toys, Bee to Hive Matching Game
Battery Operated Train for Wooden Train Set
Wooden Train Set, Battery Operated Trains & Wooden Train Tracks

Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

Dell Inspiron 3910 Desktop – Intel Core i7-12700 processor, 16GB DDR4 RAM, 512GB SSD, Intel UHD 770 Graphics, Intel Wi-Fi 6, 2 Years + 6 Months Retail Dell Migrate, Windows 11 Pro – Mist Blue
12th Gen Intel Core i7-12700 processor (12-Core, 25M Cache, 2.1GHz to 4.8GHz)
16GB (16GBx1) 3200MHz DDR4; 512GB M.2 PCIe NVMe Solid State Drive
Intel Wi-Fi 6 2×2 (Gig+) and Bluetooth 5.2

  1. Anything and everything

    With 12th Gen Intel Core processors and UHD graphics, you have the tools you need for smooth and seamless multitasking.

    • 12th Gen Intel Core i7-12700 Processor (12-Core, 25M Cache, 2.1GHz to 4.8GHz)
    • Intel UHD Graphics 770 with shared graphics Memory
    • 512GB M.2 PCIe NVMe Solid State Drive Storage
    • 16 GB, DDR4, 3200 MHz Memory

  2. Windows 11 brings you closer to what you love

    Family, friends, obsessions, music, creations—Windows 11 is the one place for it all. With a fresh new feel and tools that make it easier to be efficient, it has what you need for whatever’s next.

  3. Sustainability Comes Naturally.

    Dell incorporates sustainability into everything we do, from choosing sustainable materials for products and packaging to reusing, remanufacturing or responsibly recycling them at the end of their lifecycle.


More room in any room

With a 14.7L chassis this new compact desktop fits just about anywhere in your home, without sacrificing performance.

Easy connecting

There’s no waiting on an unstable signal with the new Wifi 6. It gives you a wider range, more stability and faster connection speeds. Plus, a Display Port that makes it easy to connect up to three FHD monitors or one 4K monitor.

Accessing your media is easy too. Media Card Reader allows you to access videos and photos just about whenever you want.

Dimensions

1. Height: 324.3 mm 2. Width: 154 mm 3. Depth: 293 mm

Price: $35.99 - $27.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:30:20 UTC – Details)

Product Description

When 2 people are doing target practice together, it’s easy enough to add up points at the end by checking the pockets, since each person has a different color of ball.

360°Rotation Power Popper Guns

Comes with two air powered guns, easy to use and fun. Gun collects air when pushing handle out and uses it to push the ball out when pulling handle in.

Blast Shooting Target Toy

The pump action gun is easy enough for the children to operate. The blast shooting game can play indoor and outdoor, and kids can play with friends and family.

Shooting Range 12 to 15 ft Max

Balls are also soft and light. The balls are not hard, so don’t hurt even if hit in close range. This is nice indoor game for kids.

Perfect Birthday Gift Choice

The shooting game toy is very light-weight, and more over not harmful for small kids. It comes with everything you need for a fun, kid-based shooting range. Party favor gift for any child who’s like fighting game!

Shooting Target Games Kit: Package has a whole setup with shoot range board, 24pcs soft foam balls (2 colors: 12 orange and 12 yellow) and 2pcs Air pump blaster guns. This target practice toy is perfect because it comes with everything you need for a fun and big enough for 2 kids to shoot the targets at the same time.
2-Player Mode Fun Gun Toy: The target board is very light weight and easy to setup and easy to put away as well. The use and operation of the pump action gun is easy enough for the youngest to operate. The power popper gun has 360 degree butt and shoot around 12ft, so much fun shooting at the target and competing for who can get the most shots.
Great Indoor Game for Kids: The guns are easy to load by just pressing the balls by hand into the front where they are shot out of. The foam balls are very light and it is painless when you are hit, very safe for little kids. The balls being two different colors is very helpful so that players can easy enough to add up points and know who will win more scores.
Fun for Kids and Adults: The blast shooting game can play outside or a big basement, and kids can play with friends and family. This toy can shoot quite a distance but are not painful in any way. Perfect for target practice and games, improve hand-eye coordination and fine motor skills. A great well made toy for children of all ages.
Great Idea Gift for Age 5+: It’s a parent-child interactive toy that can reduce kid’s devices time and make fun family time! Highly recommend it if you’re looking for something simple and entertaining that promotes physical activity and can be used indoors or outdoors. The best choice for boys Birthday gift or Christmas gift.

Read more

Price: $24.99 - $15.35
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:25:25 UTC – Details)


Bring the shenanigans of the Dunder Mifflin paper company to your home with this Little People Collector The Office figure set by Fisher-Price! This set features four figures styled to look just like characters from the hit American TV series The Office, including Michael Scott, Dwight Schrute, Pam Beesly and Jim Halpert. This must-have figure set is a great gift for The Office fans of all ages!
Special edition Little People Collector figure set featuring four characters from the hit American TV series, The Office
Includes Michael Scott, Dwight Schrute, Pam Beesly and Jim Halpert, all styled to look like the characters on the show
Toddler-friendly figures measure just under 3 inches tall (6.9 cm)
Look for more special edition Little People Collector figure sets to add to your collection (Each set sold separately and subject to availability.)
Great gift for The Office fans ages 1-101 years

Read more

​Meet your new coworkers

​With the Little People Collector The Office figure set, fans of the TV show can become the assistant to the assistant to the regional manager of the famous paper supply company. Gather ’round the watercooler with Michael Scott, Dwight Schrute, and the sweet office romancers, Pam Beesly and Jim Halpert. Each Little People character figure stands just under 3 inches tall.

Read more

​Welcome to Dunder Mifflin

​This special edition Little People figure set comes in a giftable, The Office-themed package featuring fun graphics from the hit series. This adorable set is an excellent addition to any The Office collection.

Read more

​Fan Favorites for a Collector’s Shelf

​Little People Collector figure sets from Fisher-Price take some of your favorite celebrities, musicians, and characters from television and film and bring them down to Little People toy size. These adorable 3-inch figures come in specially designed, gift-ready packages to make the perfect addition to any fan’s collection.

Read more

5
Price: $24.99 - $15.35
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:25:25 UTC – Details)
